name: Janai Krshi Dnyan Seva Bhavi Shikshan Sanstha
briefDescription: Janai Krushi Dnyan Seva Bhavi Shikshan Sanstha ,started operations As per Bombay Public Trust Act 1950 ( Clue 19) in 2007 with the mission of providing a full range of financial services to the economically active poor who are not adequately served by financial institutions. Presently, our operations is spread across Nanded District within 89 Villages , We serve over 2.10 Crore active customers through our 70 SHGâ€™s .  we tie up  with NABARD for SHG registration and Bank Linkage Programme. Janai business is primarily based on the joint liability group lending model for providing collateral free, small ticket-size loans to economically active poor women.
